channel.title: Funstuff on Tanay Kumar Saha
channel.description: Recent content in Funstuff on Tanay Kumar Saha

item.title: Getting started with Lego Mindstorm EV3
item.description: Ruwan and I spend a lot of time together in Starbucks before his defense. He shared his experience s with 3D printer and all other cool stuff he does at home. I visited his home recently and was amazed by his works. His wife also entertained me with the delicious tea. He suggested starting with Lego Mindstorm ev3 as it has nice programming experience module. I bought the toolkit on that day.
